data.text: Ask of Yahweh rain in the spring time,
For the teraphim10:2 teraphim were household idols that may have been associated with inheritance rights to the household property. have spoken vanity,
My anger is kindled against the shepherds,
From him will come the cornerstone,
They will be as mighty men,
â€œI will strengthen the house of Judah,
Ephraim will be like a mighty man,
I will signal for them and gather them,
I will sow them among the peoples.
I will bring them again also out of the land of Egypt,
He will pass through the sea of affliction,
I will strengthen them in Yahweh.
